name: Zodiac - All Day Dining Benaulim (Member of ITC Hotels' Group)

reviews.review_text: We had an excellent dining experience at this restaurant! It's a great spot for seafood lovers. We ordered the grilled pomfret, and it was absolutely delicious – perfectly cooked and full of flavor. The staff were courteous and extremely helpful, guiding us through the menu and making thoughtful recommendations. We visited with an infant, and the atmosphere was warm and welcoming – our little one seemed to enjoy the place as much as we did. Overall, a wonderful experience with tasty food and fantastic service. Highly recommended!

Beautiful venue. Food was amazing. Highly recommend the Prawn Balchau. Staff and service are amazing too, helped us out with turning lights low and putting big fan on when insects came out when it got dark, they were super helpful and friendly.

Great service from Mr Khan and team, delicious food for breakfast and lunch/ dinner, in particular the cocktails (very good Margheritas!) and the great variety of Indian and international dishes. We particularly liked the butter chicken, butter garlic naan, garlic prawns..  The pasta was also very good when you are ready for a change of cuisine! Also very well accommodating for allergies. Thank you!
